## Part 1

Binarized the input

```{r}
input  |> 
  str_length() -> linelg
mat_limits <- which(linelg == 0)

first <- input[seq_len(mat_limits[1]) - 1L] |> 
  str_replace_all(c("\\." = "0", "#" = "1")) |> 
  tibble(x = _) |> 
  adventdrob::grid_matrix(var = x)

# loop over to find all zeroes
first[1, ] - first[3]
```
